text: Harold Columbus "Hal" Suit (April 1, 1922â€”November 20, 1994) was an American local television news personality and politician. He won the 1970 Republican nomination for Governor of Georgia but lost the November general election to future U.S. President Jimmy Carter.McClellan, Don. "Nobody Remembers Hal Suit?".
